issue.title: [C++] MSVC version isn't detected in code page 932
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3147](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3147). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no space between "Microsoft" and "(R)" in cl.exe output on code page 932.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3147?focusedCommentId=16597770) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
